alert.note: Alert for Butler; Montgomery; Preble; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:42AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN PREBLE, NORTHERN BUTLER, NORTHWESTERN WARREN AND SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM EDT... At 542 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Gratis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Middletown, Trotwood, Oxford, Miamisburg, Springboro, Trenton, Franklin, Moraine, Carlisle, West Carrollton, Camden, Gratis, Seven Mile, Darrtown, Hunter, Germantown, New Lebanon and Farmersville. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 34 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
